author: KevinMarquette
body:
Some Pester tests in Utility/Implicit.Remoting.Tests.ps1 need to be reviewed or refactored.

- [ ] use of `Should -Not -Be NullOrEmpty` should be `Should -Not -BeNullOrEmpty` and tested because of functional change

comments.author: KevinMarquette
comments.body: Working on remediating this one now.

title: Code Cleanup: Pester tests in Utility/Implicit.Remoting.Tests.ps1 need reviewed
